jobs.title: Lead Estimator / Project Manager
description: Introduced new technology within the company to allow a more efficient workplace
Provide pricing proposals for clients and meet required deadlines for bids
Manage projects while clearly commutating with the production team the needs of the clients

jobs.title: Office Assistant
description: Execute empathic communication with customers and wait staff
Processed client orders to establish ticket sales
Provided exceptional consumer satisfaction thought customer interactions and assisted with inquires

jobs.title: Office Assistant/ Dispatch
description: Collaborated internally with coordinators, as well as communicated progress externally with customers
Executed the scheduling of all pick ups
Oversaw drivers and prepare required paperwork

jobs.title: Assistant Scenic Designer
description: Assisted in the research and design of sets for multiply theatre productions
Worked alongside the technical director, master carpenter, and scenic designer to ensure the final design is accomplished successfully within a deadline
Delegated work assignments to multiple students and coordinated the painting production schedule
